alert.note: Alert for Lee; Terrell (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 6:46PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Lee and Terrell Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 645 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles north of Plains to near Smithville. These storms were drifting slowly southward. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Dawson, Albany, Sasser, Bronwood, Parrott, Bridges Crossroad, Herod, Yeomans, Clarks Mill, Dawson Municipal A/P, Graves, Armena, Oakville, Olivers Mill and Chickasawhatchee. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
